quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no-one is allowed to be magnificent.
Rock'n'roll will never go away completely because it's so fundamentally attractive.
Rock and roll is here to stay.
Rock n' roll is poison put to sound.
The great thing about rock-n-roll is you realize the top of the mountain is big enough for more than one band.
Rock & roll is like a painting. Can great paintings still be done? It depends on who holds the brush.
I have Rock 'n' Roll pumping through my veins.
If you think you are too old to rock 'n roll, then you are.
Rock and roll doesn't necessarily mean a band. It doesn't mean a singer, and it doesn't mean a lyric, really. It's that question of trying to be immortal.
Rock'n'roll starts between the legs and goes through the heart, then to the head. As long as it does those three things, it's a great rock song.
Rock and Roll has no beginning and no end for it is the very pulse of life itself.
Rock and roll has probably given more than it's taken.
Rock 'n' Roll might not solve your problems, but it does let you dance all over them.
Rock n roll stops the traffic.
Life is a disease. The only cure is rock 'n' roll.
There's always gonna be rock n' roll bands, there's always gonna be kids that love rock n' roll records, and there will always be rock n' roll.
Rock and roll is the music of America, of youth, of rebellion, and of the common spirit that ties all that together.
You can't kill Rock 'n' Roll. It's here to stay
God gives us the ability, but rock 'n' roll was created by men.
What would rock and roll be without ambition, craziness, danger, and fun?
You're not a rock 'n' roll person four hours a day or even when you're on stage. It's become the rhythm of your whole life.
Rock and roll is the hamburger that ate the world.
Rock 'n' roll is like a circus today.
The reason kids like rock 'n roll is their parents don't.
Rock 'n' roll never sleeps it just passes out.
Rock is rock, and, rock and roll, rock is just short for rock and roll.
Rock 'n' roll will never die. There'll always be some arrogant little brat who wants to make music with a guitar.
You know, your clothes may say disco, but your eyes say rock n roll.
If Music is a Place -- then Jazz is the City, Folk is the Wilderness, Rock is the Road, Classical is a Temple.
Girls have got balls. They're just a little higher up, that's all.
